channel.title: Wanting to learn to code custom npcs and wepons to 317 server plz help
channel.description: hi i want some one to help me add banods bos and bosdo gears to my server and client so it dont null out and i want to add the spec to my arma god sword plzz help me ou t:)

item.title: Wanting to learn to code custom npcs and wepons to 317 server plz help
item.dc:creator: @Vexoxx Vexoxx
item.description:
@Vexoxx wrote:

I can help with the adding in bandos but your going to need to find the npc id.

First Open your autospawn.cfg and add this command.

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = #### Xcord Ycord 0 0 0 2 //1

Replace the #'s with the npc id.

To add drops simply go into config folder add a section for bandos and use this code from my source as a base.

npcdrop = 1115 1107 1 5

the last number is the percentage of how often it will drop, change that to your custom.

Hopefully this helps im also new to coding and this is just what ive learnt so far.

Read full topic
item.source: Wanting to learn to code custom npcs and wepons to 317 server plz help
